meanings.definition: The act of concentrating too much on a particular thing or in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: Her overconcentration on her phone caused her to miss the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: His overconcentration on work led to neglecting his health.
meanings.sent3: During the game, his overconcentration on the scoreboard made him trip over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The overconcentration of bees around the hive symbolized their dedication to the queen.
meanings.sent5: The overconcentration of stars in the night sky made it feel like a magical canopy above.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly focused or fixated on one specific aspect.
meanings.sent1: The student's overconcentration on getting a perfect score caused unnecessary stress.
meanings.sent2: Her overconcentration on her appearance made her forget about her inner qualities.
meanings.sent3: His overconcentration on winning the game made him trip over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: The overconcentration of colors in the painting drew the viewer's eye to the center.
meanings.sent5: The overconcentration of flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.
